name: 7-Zip
description: 7-Zip is a file archiver with a high compression ratio. It is used to compress files into a variety of archive formats, including its own 7z format, as well as ZIP, GZIP, BZIP2, and TAR. 7-Zip can also decompress a wide range of formats such as RAR, CAB, ISO, and more. It offers features like a strong AES-256 encryption in 7z and ZIP formats for secure file compression.
